item.title: standup comedy
item.description: â€‹ With the advent of Internet, the meme culture and standup comedy culture has blasted in the last few years. Internet has not only enabled the reach via social networks, People could try out different material not only cheaply but also with the ease of a click. The showoff of facebook check-ins and instagram stories have acted as catalyst in the expansion of the gig culture. Good gags (likeness is subjective):
